thread.title: Elie Makhoul

author: Elie Makhoul
title: Elie Makhoul
text: I am very satisfied to buy from play-asia.com because of the professionalism they are providing on all the levels. Best support team ever. Very high responsive to the messages. I have received the goods in a very great condition which is not available with other online shopping services most of the time. Play-Asia team, keep up the great job. I really recommend your service to anyone.
